title: Facebook Ads Creative Intelligence Input
description: Configure the Facebook Ads Library scraper and intelligence extractor

advertiser_ids.title: Advertiser Page IDs
advertiser_ids.description: List of Facebook Page IDs to monitor for ads. Find page IDs in the URL when viewing a page on Facebook Ads Library.

search_terms.title: Search Keywords
search_terms.description: Keywords to search for in ads. The scraper will find ads containing these terms.

country_code.title: Country Code
country_code.description: ISO country code for geo-targeting (e.g., US, GB, DE, FR)

ad_status.title: Ad Status Filter
ad_status.description: Filter ads by their current status

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: Filter ads that started running on or after this date (YYYY-MM-DD)

end_date.title: End Date
end_date.description: Filter ads that started running on or before this date (YYYY-MM-DD)

max_ads_per_advertiser.title: Max Ads per Advertiser
max_ads_per_advertiser.description: Maximum number of ads to collect per advertiser (1-1000)

include_media_urls.title: Include Media URLs
include_media_urls.description: Whether to extract and include media (image/video) URLs in the output

classify_ads.title: Classify Ads
classify_ads.description: Enable AI-powered classification of ad angles, hooks, and offer types
